mapper.select: SELECT /* AppguideMapper.xml, getVersion, SAC 전시, 윤주영/GTSoft, 2014-02-28 */ * FROM ( SELECT P.* FROM ( SELECT SC.APK_PKG_NM AS APK_PKG ,SC.APK_VER_NM AS APK_VER_CD ,ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER( PARTITION BY P.PROD_ID, SC.VM_VER ORDER BY P.REG_DT DESC, SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID DESC ) AS RNUM FROM TB_DP_PROD P ,TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SH ,TB_CM_DEVICE PHI WHERE P.PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND SH.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND (PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceHeader.model} OR PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{virtualDeviceModel}) AND PHI.REP_DEVICE_YN = 'Y' AND PHI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SC.SALE_YN = 'Y' AND SC.APK_PKG_NM = #{packageName} AND SC.VM_VER LIKE '%'||#{osVersion}||'%' ) P WHERE RNUM = 1 ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
